general: FYI, an error occurred. Please try again later.

401.title: Sorry, but I can't remember who you are

403.title: Sorry, you can't perform that action
403.message: You may need to log out and in again

404.title: Sorry, the system couldn't find what you're looking for
404.message: It may help if you to log out and in again

500.title: Yikes, something broke
500.message: Please try again in a few moments

401Login.title: Bad news, I can't log you in :-(
401Login.message: Please check your email and password
